name: THE PINK Mansion
description:
NOTHING IS REAL IN THE PINK HOUSE

CONTEXT

Jun, a house seller, must go to the house he is going to sell, but first he wants to see why the house has the history that is cursed, so the house can be clean of suspect of his possible "curse"

THE GAME IS LIKE 15 LONG AND IS AND EXPERIMENT, IT HAS 2 ENDINGS (EASY TO GET BOOTH)

Hope you like my game, if you think something of the game can change, leave a critique.

:3
